mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xiangmu_uuid_number as xiangmuUuidNumber ,a.xiangmu_name as xiangmuName ,a.laiyuan_types as laiyuanTypes ,a.xiangmu_types as xiangmuTypes ,a.kaishi_time as kaishiTime ,a.jieshu_time as jieshuTime ,a.huafei_jine as huafeiJine ,a.yanjiufangxiang_types as yanjiufangxiangTypes ,a.yanjiufangxiang_file as yanjiufangxiangFile ,a.xiangmu_content as xiangmuContent ,a.xiangmu_chengguo_content as xiangmuChengguoContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.xiangmu_yesno_types as xiangmuYesnoTypes ,a.xiangmu_yesno_text as xiangmuYesnoText ,a.xiangmu_shenhe_time as xiangmuShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM xiangmu a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xiangmu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuUuidNumber},'%')
and a.xiangmu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuName},'%')
and a.laiyuan_types = #{params.laiyuanTypes}
and a.xiangmu_types = #{params.xiangmuTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaishiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jieshu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.jieshu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.jieshuTimeEnd})
and a.huafei_jine >= #{params.huafeiJineStart}
and a.huafei_jine <= #{params.huafeiJineEnd}
and a.yanjiufangxiang_types = #{params.yanjiufangxiangTypes}
and a.xiangmu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuContent},'%')
and a.xiangmu_chengguo_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuChengguoContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.xiangmu_yesno_types = #{params.xiangmuYesnoTypes}
and a.xiangmu_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiangmuYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xiangmu_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiangmuShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xiangmu_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiangmuShenheTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
